name: Terebi Oekaki
overview:
Terebi Oekaki (テレビおえかき) is the game packaged with the Sega Graphic Board for the SG-1000. It is a simple paint program.

This was the first game to feature the use of touch controls. It required the use of the Sega Graphic Board tablet, along with a stylus pen that came with it.
